title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        Filming with Jimmy Carter at Clark House on the Boyhood Farm NATIONAL PARK SERVICE   Â    News  The Jimmy Carter National Historic Site makes every effort to keep you informed about news events, special events, park programs and services, and new or ongoing projects. News Releases for Jimmy Carter National Historic Site will be posted, so check back often to keep current about happenings at the park. You may also contact the park by email or call (229) 824-4104.   Social Media  To stay connected and learn what's happening at the jimmy Carter National Historic Site, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter or Instagram.
